title: Psychoneurotic conditions: obsessive-compulsive neurosis
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Behavior therapy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychoanalysis
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Treatment
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Obsessive-compulsive neurosis
description: Episode of Series "Disordered Mind". Presents the case-history of a middle-aged man who, despite good education and intellect has been unable to hold a job during the five years prior to the start of treatment for an obsessive-compulsive neurosis. Includes the patient's feelings about his symptoms and his progress in therapy.
